mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.hosts AS "hosts", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.authway AS "authway", u9.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u9 ON u9.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_interface_whitelist( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, hosts, user_id, authway ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{hosts}, #{user.id}, #{authway} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_interface_whitelist SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, hosts = #{hosts}, user_id = #{user.id}, authway = #{authway} WHERE id = #{id}
